title: ボクらの秘密を共有しようか [Bokura no Himitsu o Kyouyuu Shiyou ka]
description: 1) Bokura no Himitsu o Kyouyuu Shiyou kaYuka goes to Ikimonogakari's room to ask them to solve her love problem, but unfortunately, they couldn't help her. To make her feel better, the people in the club gives her a piece of candy. Yuka eats it, and she suddenly gets cat ears and a tail! What happened to her? Will she ever go back to normal?2) Colorful Shounen to Monochrome na AtashiNaoki and Kiyo have known each other for a long time because they live in the same apartment complex. One Valentine's Day, Kiyo gave Naoki a chocolate cake, but Naoki threw it away and laughed it off. Because of that, Kiyo doesn't make sweets anymore! Because Naoki's dad is Kiyo's dad's boss and they are going on a trip, Kiyo has to make food for Naoki. Will Kiyo re-live the trauma of the past?3) Kaibutsu-kun ni ReiAt the Christmas training camp, Yuzuki was paired up with no other than... that guy?!4) Itoshi no Himeko-chanAnri, who is usually bad at handling boys, is asked out by the school's most attractive guy, Takuma! This is so she can gradually get used to guys, however, does Takuma have another agenda in play? What is going to happen between the two?5) Shiro no Kiseki
author: Yuki Shiraishi
